protein.general_function: Involved in G-protein coupled receptor protein signaling pathway
protein.specific_function: Receptor for N-arachidonyl glycine. The activity of this receptor is mediated by G proteins which inhibit adenylyl cyclase. May contribute to regulation of the immune system

go_class.description: purinergic nucleotide receptor activity, g-protein coupled
cell surface receptor linked signaling pathway
g-protein coupled receptor protein signaling pathway

reference.reference_text: Gantz I, Muraoka A, Yang YK, Samuelson LC, Zimmerman EM, Cook H, Yamada T: Cloning and chromosomal localization of a gene (GPR18) encoding a novel seven transmembrane receptor highly expressed in spleen and testis. Genomics. 1997 Jun 15;42(3):462-6.
